mapper.update: update ruzhu_t set kehu_id = #{keHu_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kehu = #{keHu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bianhao = #{bianHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fjhao = #{fjHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yuding = #{yuDing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jzsj = #{jzSj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rzsj = #{rzSj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rzts = #{rzTs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfzhao = #{sfzHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dianhua = #{dianHua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fangjian_id = #{fangJian_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fangxing = #{fangXing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiage = #{jiaGe,jdbcType=FLOAT}, jine = #{jinE,jdbcType=FLOAT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuzeren = #{fuzeRen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

and state = #{state}
